column1: #text=Last summer , my friend Heidi and I were walking through Home Depot when we saw tree seedlings for sale .
#text=We had been looking for a new project to do together , so we decided to purchase one .
#text=After making the purchase , we went looking for a place to plant our tree .
#text=We agreed on her backyard , since my house does not have much of a yard .
#text=When we got to her house , we found a perfect place in the corner of her backyard .
#text=We grabbed our shovels and began to roughen the sides and bottom of where we were planting a tree , so that the root tips can penetrate the soil .
#text=Then we created a water basin with mulch and filled the basin with water .
#text=We were proud of our newly planted tree , so we made sure to take many pictures .
#text=We ca n't wait to see how our tree will grow over the years .
